name: Death-Trap
description:
Welcome to the execution grounds.

 Here you will test my skill, as well as your own.

 As the seconds pass, the challenges will increase.

Random traps will appear. Collect the golden rings, collecting five will keep you alive! (Health)

 Your high score will keep you doing more. 

See how just how high you can go, enjoy the show!

It is all about figuring it out and having fun. Thank you for playing my game! 

Instructions for game:

you control Pompo(green sphere with cute eyes).

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

dodge Enemies and traps.
